channel.title: Make an object give an item if you have a certain item...?
channel.description:
How do i make an object give an item if you use another item on it?
EX; There's a chest and you have a key, how do i make it so you get 50k or so if you use the key on the chest but the key is deleted?
EXTRA(only if you can...): But you can only do this ONCE. After it's done the first time that player can't do this anymore.

item.title: Make an object give an item if you have a certain item...?
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

[quote=“hulkman68, post:16, topic:308031”]lol[/quote]Not needed.

Read full topic

item.title: Make an object give an item if you have a certain item...?
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

[quote=“justinxg27, post:14, topic:308031”]Most probaly in a object file, I don’t know 317’s.

For example

case 4956:
p.addItem(p, 275, 1);
break;[/quote]

Damn, i don’t have a Object handler or Object.java or anything even to do with Object that doesn’t have less than 10 lines to it.

Well, post the code here…

Nevermind, I’m pretty sure it wouldn’t have been useful anyway. But… I think i can make it work, now. I’m checking out some other posts on starter commands etc and finding answers. I’m good, for now.

Thank you, though!
[/quote]Lol dude, It could be very usefull, I could make it give a key on starter.[/quote]

Finding the key is part of the quest. I know how to make it give a key on start.

Also, WHERE DO I PUT THE CODE FOR THE CHEST TO GIVE THE 50K? Lmao.

item.title: Make an object give an item if you have a certain item...?
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

[quote=“justinxg27, post:6, topic:308031”][quote author=PushedPrawn link=topic=404124.msg2991578#msg2991578 date=1255309651]

I edited it again to your likings, with the key and money 50k and delete key.

Alright… I’ll test it, but… While I’m doing that, how would i make a command, which gives the key, not be able to be used twice?

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("questcmd") && isInBridge() == true) {
		addItem(275, 1);
}

That’s my current command, which gives the key. How would i make it only be used once? (Like a starter)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 11, 2009, 07:08:26 pm[/size][hr][quote author=justinxg27 link=topic=404124.msg2991569#msg2991569 date=1255309367]
I edited it again to your likings, with the key and money 50k and delete key.
[/quote]

Oh, and where do i add it? (The give item code you gave me)
[/quote]
Oh that’s going to take ages to explain. You have to go into filemanager and put in all ints and declare in player file, it would take to long,

But Maybe editing your starter to give you a key will work. Paste your starter command here.[/quote]

Dun gotta starter. Where do i add that other command, anyway?

Read full topic

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("questcmd") && isInBridge() == true) {

item.source: Make an object give an item if you have a certain item...?

item.title: Make an object give an item if you have a certain item...?
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

[quote=“justinxg27, post:2, topic:308031”]Something like,

if(Engine.playerItems.HasItemAmount(p, 995, 1) {
pi.addItem(p, 2573, 1);
}
break;

Possibly something like that.

Edit: instead of p.additem, try, pi.additem[/quote]

Aaight, where would i add that?

Read full topic
item.source: Make an object give an item if you have a certain item...?

item.title: Make an object give an item if you have a certain item...?
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

Something like,

if(Engine.playerItems.HasItemAmount(p, 275, 1) {
pi.addItem(p, 995, 50000);
pi.deleteItem(p, 275, 1);
}
break;

There i wrote what you asked for let me know if it works.

Read full topic
